arts.ttl: 25 of the best fan pictures from Burnley's draw against Derby County
arts.sum: A crowd of 18,818 watched on as Burnley and Derby County played out a goalless draw at Turf Moor.

arts.ttl: One thing really pleased the Derby County management team against Burnley
arts.sum: Richie Barker said he was "very proud" of Derby County's battling performance at Burnley as the Rams scrapped to a deserved point at Turf Moor. "My final assessment would be that I am very proud of a group of people who have had one day to work on a game plan.
Highlights of the Sky Bet Championship match between Burnley and Derby County.

arts.ttl: Burnley 0, Derby 0: Clarets unable to break down stubborn Rams
arts.sum: It will go down as yet another missed opportunity.

arts.ttl: Derby battle for point at Burnley
arts.sum: Burnley were frustrated by a rejected first-half penalty appeal as they were held to a goalless Championship draw by a stubborn Derby side at Turf Moor.

arts.ttl: Burnley frustrated by rejected first-half penalty appeal in Derby stalemate
arts.sum: The home side were convinced that defender Nat Phillips handled Josh Brownhill’s cross-shot in the 33rd minute.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v Burnley as trio outstanding in excellent battling display
arts.sum: A smart move involving Nat Phillips and Dajaune Brown saw Joe Ward win a corner which was knocked down to Kenzo Goudmijn on the edge of the box but he fired over the bar. Joe Ward: Put in a couple of crosses into the box that Derby could not make the most out of and there was one moment in the first half when a fancy trick didn't come off and Burnley were on the attack.

arts.ttl: Burnley FC pitch invader banned for life
arts.sum: Burnley FC has confirmed the individual who ran onto the pitch during the game against Middlesbrough on Friday evening has been identified and banned from Turf Moor for life.

arts.ttl: Former Burnley and England footballer Martin Dobson releases new book
arts.sum: Former Burnley and England footballer Martin Dobson will be signing copies of his new book at an event in Colne.

arts.ttl: ‘That isn’t the case’ – Derby County boss confirms future of Premier League loanee amid continued struggle
